attributes.action: Tell us if the charging of G4S employees is more about protecting the company than service of justice.
attributes.additional_details: It is amazing that taxpayer funded employees NEVER get arraigned when they commit murder or other crimes when carrying out their jobs, which means the taxpayer forever picks up the tab.  G4S is a private company and could it be that too many politicians are financially involved with it for their future profits to be affected by being charged with corporate murder and huge (taxpayer funded sized) compensation payments being ordered?  Hence the need to ensure G4S avoids prosecution.
